member.name: T:DynamicRestProxy.RestProxy
member.summary: Base proxy class. Derived classes implement the specfic rest/http communication mechanisms. Each node in a chain of proxy instances represents a specific endpoint

member.name: M:DynamicRestProxy.RestProxy.CreateProxyNode(DynamicRestProxy.RestProxy,System.String)
member.summary: Factory method used to create instances of derived child nodes. Overrideen in derived classess to create derived instances
member.param: The parent of the newly created child
The name of the newly created child

member.name: M:DynamicRestProxy.RestProxy.CreateVerbAsyncTask(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Object},System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Abstract method to create a Task that will execute the necessary http communication
member.param: The http verb to execute (must be get, post, put or delete)
Unnamed arguments passed to the invocation. These go into the http request body
Named arguments supplied to the invocation. These become http request parameters
member.returns: Task that will execute the http call and return a dynamic object with the results

member.name: M:DynamicRestProxy.RestProxy.GetEndPointPath(System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: Used to generate a complete Url for the endpoint

member.name: M:DynamicRestProxy.RestProxy.GetEndPointPath
member.summary: The complete Url (minus parameters) for this endpoint

member.name: M:DynamicRestProxy.RestProxy.ToString
member.returns: The full Url of this node in the path chain

member.name: P:DynamicRestProxy.RestProxy.Name
member.summary: The name of this node. This is the text used when forming the complete Url

member.name: P:DynamicRestProxy.RestProxy.Index
member.summary: The numeric index of this node in the chain

member.name: P:DynamicRestProxy.RestProxy.BaseUrl
member.summary: The base Url of the endpoint. Overridden in derived classess to allow specific rest client to deteremine how it is stored
